title: Bowl, 1955
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Slightly curved bowl of red clay, with grog added to give coars surface.  Brownish black, metallic glaze, short and dry on outside.  Fourteen streamer-like white trianges with black stripes around inner edge.  Incised spiral line in bottom. Signature: "Vermes" (incised)

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, 1955.
1955. earthenware. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1955-64-6.
